blue.lapis.common.command

Interface CommandContext<S extends org.spongepowered.api.util.command.CommandSource>


  • public interface CommandContext<S extends org.spongepowered.api.util.command.CommandSource>
    Represents the environment in which a command has been called; its CommandConfiguration, its CommandSource, parsed arguments, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T get(Class<T> clazz, int argNum)
      Gets the specified typesafe argument.
      String getLine() 
      S getSource() 
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<String> getTokens() 

    • Method Detail

      • getSource

        @Nonnull
S getSource()
        Returns:
        the CommandSource which this command was issued from

      • getLine

        @Nonnull
String getLine()
        Returns:
        the entire line of text entered, except for the portion recognized as the command

      • getTokens

        @Nonnull
com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<String> getTokens()
        Returns:
        the tokens in String format, as determined by the Tokenizer for this command

      • get

        @Nullable
<T> T get(Class<T> clazz,
                    int argNum)
        Gets the specified typesafe argument. Throws InvalidTokenException if the argument is not of the expected type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected class of the argument
        Parameters:
        clazz - The expected class of the argument
        argNum - The index of the argument. Note that this is the argument number, not the token number.
        Returns:
        The argument if it exists, or null if the index is past the end of the list
